data: Suppress the effects of a single curse.
You can move slowly and safely and still cast spells, until you move quickly, make an attack, or cast a harmful spell.
Create a protective sphere around yourself, providing you with improved cover.
Removes enchantments and forgives actions taken under their effects.
Absorb a magic rune up to 3rd level, which can be moved or dispelled
As absorb rune I, but affecting a rune up to 5th level
As absorb rune I, but affecting a rune up to 8th level
Protect an area from ranged attacks
Attempt to weakne a corruption's effect at risk to yourself
Enchanted cloak grants shield bonus to AC and can use aid another on you once per round
Create a mental mine that damages creatures that target you with mind-affecting effects
As animus mind, but stuns the offending creatures
Incorporeal creatures stay 10 ft. away from you.
Impede the use of summon spells.
Create a field that prevents advanced technology from entering
Protect a creautre from incedental exposure to poison
Targeted dispel transfers an effect to you.
Magically locks a portal or chest.
Create an area to completely block out spells of your choosing.
Removes burden of misdeeds from subject and reverses magical alignment change.
Increases strength of a paladin's aura of courage.
Ward your attended items against theft.
Eliminate the gifts of a nearby corrupted creature
Dispels touched illusion or a creature's change in form.
Enhanced weapon gets free bull rush attempts on attacks.
Transfer your paladin or antipaladin auras to another creature.
Subject gains bonus on saving throws equal to Cha modifier.
Create an invisible snare to trap weapons.
+1-3 luck bonus to CMD and saves vs. spells/traps that would impede your movement; can end the spell early to gain a boost to speed.
Become immune to any damaging area spells you cast.
Protect yourself against a mind-affecting effect and redirect it to a nearby creature
Protect a book from fire, acid, and water.
Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.
You gain a +4 deflection bonus to AC against firearm attacks.
Reduce the strength of wind in an area.
Does 2d8 damage +1/level (max +15) to creature and dispels an effect.
Imbue an object with an acidic protective ward.
+4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against lawful spells.
Reduces effects of intense sun exposure and environmental heat.
Creates a screen of wind around you.
Provide another spell whose effects reverse if the target breaks a restriction.
Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.
Target gains +4 to AC and saves;; resist attacks and spells from neutral creatures
Sap the powers of beneficial spells cast near to you.
Touching the marked object or area turns one's skin red.
Ward shadows so light cannot penetrate them.
Target gains dodge bonus to AC against larger creatures.
As sanctify armor, but gain DR 5/good when using judgment or smite.
Attacks that miss are redirected back to the source of the attack.
Create an invisible circle to trap outsiders.
Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.
Reduce the areas of divination spells for the purpose of targeting you
Dissipate the charges from a technical object or hamper a creature with the robot subtype.
As discharge, but with greater effects that can effect an area.
Forces a creature to return to native plane.
You are protected from neutral enemies
Cancels one magical spell or effect.
Works as dispel magic, but can affect multiple targets.
Sever the target's link with her bonded creature.
Disrupt all silence effects in an area.
Stop a dragon from using its breath weapon along with reducing its magical prowess.
Treat the natural attack damage of a creature attacking you as five sizes smaller.
Ward a target's mind to protect them while unconscious.
Ward an item so it will be destroyed if others try to learn its purpose or use it.
Gain hit points and damage your opponent immediately after counterspelling a spell.
Create a combination spherical wall of force and antimagic field.
Trick opponents who try to cast enchantments on you.
Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.
As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Ward yourself against thought detection and memory alteration.
Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.
Erase psychic impressions from an object.
As alarm, but alerts you when a creatuer leaves the area
Gain maneuverability by avoiding the attacks of larger creatures.
Wastes creatures' limited use magical ability.
Gain a free re-roll while this spell is active.
Keep yourself and your equipment clean and dry
Breathe fire and become resistant to it.
resist fire 5, DR 5/magic, +4 to saves vs pain for 24 hours, discharge to temporarily increase to resist 30, DR 10, and immunity to pain
Confuses enemies who come within a magical emanation centered on you.
Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.
Plants in a forested area become helpful instead of hindering you and your allies.
Gain the effects of freedom of movement, but also become drunk
As freedom of movement, but only allowing a creature to move freely underwater
Subject moves normally despite impediments to restrict movement.
Grant your summoned creatures a deflection bonus to their AC.
As lesser globe of invulnerability, plus 4th-level spell effects.
Create a bubble to block out all natural and magical precipitation within an area.
Inscription harms those who pass it.
As glyph of warding, but up to 10d8 damage or 6th-level spell.
Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.
As lesser guardian monument, except with DR 4/magic.
Bless a monument to imbue nearby humans with 2/magic damage reduction.
Target is protected by shield of faith and a protection spell, and can transfer the effects to another creature.
Gain a +4 insight bonus on saving throws vs a creature's abilitiy you have identified with a Knowledge check
Array of magic effects protect area.
Cause an explosive burst of growth in a single plant.
Gain protection from fire, use absorbed energy to heal others.
Floating weapons protect you and make ranged attacks
Inscription casts your hex on those who pass it.
Inscription casts your hex or major hex on those who pass it.
Target gains +4 on saves against witch hexes.
As per hide from undead, but doesn't automatically end due to combat actions
+4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells.
Lend your shield's protection to another.
Return a creature to its home plane
Prevent all nearby creatures from attacking others.
Target can use stealth to hide from blindsight and blindsense as well as divination magic
As explosive runes, except it creates a small surge of flames instead of an explosion of force.
Stabilize an area of primal magic
Suppress emotion and fear effects in a 20-ft. radius as an immediate action.
As intellect fortress I, plus reduce the damage of mind-affecting effects.
As intellect fortress II, plus remove partial effects of fear and emotion effects.
As alarm, but reacting only to invisible creatures.
Wrap the target in a mantle of summery air; this also harms creatures with the cold subtype.
Protects creatures from sustained environmental effects.
Increase your attacks of opportunity per round.
As sepia snake sigil, except using the Thassilonian schools of magic.
Reroll a failed save against an effect that would force you to take an action against your will
Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.
As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.
As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.
As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.
As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.
Protects those in an area with protection from technology, and other effects that suppress or resist technology.
Create a spherical magnetic field around yourself to pull metal objects toward you.
Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.
Become immune to gaze attacks and reflect them back on the creature using it
Gain a +4 shield bonus to AC and resist mind thrust for 1 round as an immediate action.
As mental barrier I, but +6 to AC.
As mental barrier I, but +8 to AC.
As mental barrier III, plus 25% chance to prevent critical hits and sneak attacks.
As mental barrier III, plus 50% chance to prevent critical hits and sneak attacks.
Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.
As mind blank, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Opponents cannot attack a pathetic creature.
Gain your charisma bonus as a deflection bonus to AC when not wearing armor.
As nondetection, but any number of creatures or objects in the area
Avoid trouble and harmful effects up to nine times.
Place a trap on an object to mentally damage a creature that touches it.
As nondetection, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
As nondetection, but only protects against spells that target an area
Use the Path of Numbers to grant your allies resilience in the face of elemental dangers.
Grants +5 AC and DR 10/evil, can't attack.
Make it harder to detect a poison or venomous creature.
damage creature who recognize an illusion for what it is
Take the damage and effects for another creature.
Create a glowing rune of peace to protect targets from your own magic.
Locks a weapon in place on the target's body.
As peacebond, but on multiple weapons, even if they aren't sheathed.
Use planar energy to protect yourself and retaliate with one energy type
Target acclimates to pressure changes more quickly
Free yourself from enchantments and paralysis effects.
As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.
Wall's colors have array of effects.
Subject gains DR 10/magic against ranged attacks.
As protection from arrows, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
+2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.
As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
+2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
+2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
+2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Gain DR 5/- vs one type of natural attack
Ward a creature against attacks from outsides with a specific racial subtype, more powerful than protection from evil or similar spells.
Bolster a creature's body against the harmful effects of spore and fungus.
+2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against technology.
Coat yourself with a thin layer of energy that turns back nonlethal damage on your attacker.
Reduce the target's ability to tap into a specific energy type
Render a piece of technology inert.
Emit a calming drone so targets under the effect of negative conditions can suffer a lesser version of them instead.
Frees object or person from curse.
Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.
Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.
Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.
As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Infuse a good target with holy energy.
Chaotic, neutral, or evil spellcasters who target you with a spell take a -4 penalty to Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based skill checks
+2 to saves vs diseases, drugs, and poison for 24 hours, discharge to reroll a failed save vs a disease, drug, or poison
+1 to saves vs mind-affecting effects for 24 hours, discharge to reroll a failed save vs a mind-affecting effect.
Place a visible glyph of warding to protect a door or other entryway.
Take damage for an ally for many rounds.
Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.
Treat your normal AC as your touch AC against the next touch attack that targets you.
Prevent a creature from transferring life force to or from others.
As sealed life, plus death ward and immunity to soul transference.
As nondetection, but damages those who cast divination spells on the warded creature/item.
As alarm, but only against selected creatures.
Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.
Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles.
As shield other, but affects the caster's animal companion or familiar.
As shield other, but affecting your companion creature.
Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.
Target gains a 25% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.
Target gains a 50% chance to treat critical hits and sneak attacks as normal hits.
+4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.
You take half of subject's damage.
Speak freely to one creature within 10 feet without being overheard.
Communicate freely with a group of nearby people without anyone else being able to overhear.
Protect your tribe's banner with a sanctuary-like effect.
A shield of force protects you until you dismiss it in an explosion of electricity.
Transfer a magical effect from another creature to yourself.
Reduce the berserk chance of a construct.
Protect your soul from harmful effects after death
As antimagic field, except suppress only a specific type of spellcasting (arcane or divine).
Use a counterspelled spell's energy in order to regain the use of your own spells.
Use Spell Absorption with higher level spells.
Subject is immune to one spell per 4 levels.
As spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
As spell immunity, but up to 8th-level spells.
As greater spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Create a whip that can lash spells from the minds of enemy spellcasters.
Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.
Target loses a 5th-level prepared spell or spell slot.
Target loses a 7th-level prepared spell or spell slot.
Target loses a 3rd-level prepared spell or spell slot.
Cause spells cast within an area to trigger primal magic effects.
Create a discordant blast of energy to disrupt a target's hold on magic and transfer it to you.
Create a sphere of energy to dispossess incorporeal creatures of stolen bodies.
Inflict touch spell upon creature that attacks you.
Target immediately adjusts to the surrounding pressure
As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Next attack against you takes -10 penalty
Magical field grants a +1 bonus to AC and on saves, and stuns one creature attacking you.
Magical field grants a +2 bonus to AC and on saves, and stuns multiple creatures attacking you.
The next weapon that sunders an item belonging to the target takes damage.
Either grant a bonus to saves against, or suppress, charm and compulsion spells
Suppress the effects of primal magic.
Dispel all magical effects within range of this symbol.
Force half of the damage you take onto another creature.
Grant targets a bonus to AC so long as they remain in formation.
Create an item that protects against the effects of an aligned plane
Create an invisible psychic interference that inhibits telepathic communication.
Create a trap that redirects teleport attempts into an area of your choosing.
As magic circle, but affecting a non-alignment subtype or outsider race.
Gain a +10 Perception bonus to notice someone trying to take a specific object from you.
As an immediate action, gain a +4 bonus on Will saves against mind-affecting effects.
As thought shield I, but +6 on Will saves.
As thought shield I, but +8 on Will saves and stun creatures that read your thoughts for 1 round.
As thought shield III, but stun for 1d4 rounds and resist psychic crush spells.
As thought shield IV, but lasts 1 round per level.
Grant allies a +4 bonus to resist enchantments/illusions.
As an immediate action, gives creatures in a 10-ft. radius spell resistance against psychic magic and mind-affecting effects.
As tower of iron will I, but lasts 2 rounds.
As tower of iron will I, but lasts 3 rounds.
As tower of iron will I, but lasts 4 rounds.
As tower of iron will I, but lasts 5 rounds.
Create a barrier to repel undead.
+4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against good spells.
Resist damage from holy sources, smite evil, etc.
Surround yourself with protection against evil outsiders.
Armor or shield gains a +1 enhancement per four levels.
Cause a sleeping creature to retain some perception of its surroundings
Wall of energy that only blocks and affects evil creatures and spells
Enhance a creature with the power of a season.
Enchant a shield with Spell Resistance and a bonus against area-effect spells.
Creatures of same faith gain bonuses to AC and on saving throws.
The weapon you use for the focus of this spell defends you, allowing you to cast spells without provoking attacks of opportunity.
As shield other, but with a shorter duration and the requirement that you must maintain line of effect with whom you are linked to.
Target becomes waterproof for the spells duration
Water blunts one incoming attack or fire effect.
Protect a feathered creature from the cold for a day.
Protect a target from being blown away by wind of less than windstorm force
Triggered rune slows the movements of creatures in the area
Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.
Four mithral daggers speed around you, attacking nearby creatures and protecting your spellcasting from attacks of opportunity.
Surrounds the target with layers of force.
Transfer the effects of afflictions from someone else to yourself.
Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.
Creates a pit with a layer of acid on the bottom.
1d6/level acid damage plus 1 round of acid.
Spit a tanglefoot bag at a creature.
Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.
Creatures take penalty to saving throws against your enchantment spells
Summon a duplicate of yourself from a parallel world to aid another
Swap one summoned creature with another.
Summon an ancestor to bring you a ghostly, magical weapon.
Transport yourself and willing creatures to a random planar destination
Send or receive a Tiny or smaller animal via teleportation.
Send or receive a small object via teleportation.
Summon hippocampi to serve as aquatic mounts
Conjure an extradimensional space inside a pouch or pocket.
Creates a safe house for air-breathing creatures underwater
As ally across time, but more cubes and more duplicates
Steal lifeforce from one creature and imbue it into another
Hellish chains attack and cause a target to become shaken
You and allies escape an emergency by teleporting to safety.
Create an enormous beanstalk that leads into the clouds.
Exist in two places at once.
Summon a caulborn to answer questions
Tentacles grapple all creatures within a 20-ft. spread.
Summon a spirit to help your more reckless attacks.
Last stand cures good creatures, hurts evil.
Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.
Mist causes Wisdom damage and rage.
Create a luxurious feast for two creatures/level.
Summons an invisible spirit that fires your arrows for you as a swift action.
Cures 5d8 damage + 1/level and restores life to recently slain creatures.
Create a field of hot sand that creates difficult terrain and minor fire damage
Summon a swarm of wasps to ward an area.
Make the spirit of one creature manifest.
Teleport a familiar or spirit animal to your side when it is injured
Teleport a familiar or spirit animal to your side from miles away when it is injured
Wasp swarm defends or carries you.
Buffeting winds increase your fly speed or carry you aloft
Create a trap from stalactites and stalagmites
Grant fast healing 1 for 1 round/2 levels.
As celestial healing, except target gains a stronger aura and fast healing 4 instead of 1.
Hold a creature immobile with glowing chains with the added benefit of preventing the use of any extradimension travel.
Create a beanstalk that is easy to climb.
Create a sickening cloud that mimics the effects of seasickness.
Kills 3 HD or less; 4-6 HD save or die, 6+ HD take Con damage.
Reduce the targets move speeds, increased effect with creatures vulnerable to cold iron
Swap places with your animal companion, familiar, or spirit animal via teleportation
Create a spiked falling block above the heads of your enemies.
Create a nonmagical weapon, shield, or set of armor.
As lesser create demiplane, but larger and with planar traits.
As create demiplane, but larger and with more planar traits.
Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.
Sense creatures suffering from fear, then teleport close to them.
Target a creature with a curse that impacts its ability to fly.
As dimension door, except you leave behind a burst of flame.
Grant the target temporary immunity to disease.
Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.
As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Teleport multiple times between two designated locations.
Creates a semi-living intelligent draconic servant that loyally obeys and serves you.
Venture into the Dimension of Dreams to enter the dreams of a designated creature, then exit near that creature's body on the plane where it lies sleeping.
As dream travel, but with more flexibility and able to affect more creatures.
Soak the target creature or object.
Spew a noxious cloud in a 30 ft. cone.
Create a duplicate of your familiar.
Black particles extinguish light sources within area.
Infuse yourself with power from a good-aligned outsider.
Hurl elementals from their respective planes onto your enemies.
Entice service from a fey with 12 Hit Dice or fewer.
Entice service from a fey of 18 Hit Dice or fewer.
Entice service from a fey with 6 Hit Dice or fewer.
Shroud your unconscious self in a cocoon on the Ethereal Plane.
As ethereal envelope, but able to affect an unwilling creature.
Fog obscures vision and fascinates living creatures.
Summon a lens of force to help protect yourself from figments/patterns or identify items.
Create a low wall or other simple structure of packed earth or stone.
Rip out the targets blood, forming it into a fiendish water elemental with blood drain
Toadstool circle leads to an extradimensional meadow.
Appear to resurrect someone but instead allow a shadow demon to possess the corpse.
Appear to use true resurrection on someone but instead allow a belier devil to possess the corpse.
Create a portal that allows travel to the First World
Calls forth several fiery projectiles ready to be flung at opponents.
Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.
As phantom steed, but immune to fire and can breathe a cone of smoke and ash
Wave of water batters and pushes creatures
Charge, then teleport back to starting poisiton
As summon swarm, but the swarm makes creatures more susceptible to transmutation spells along with penalizing Dexterity.
Worms deal hp and Dex damage.
When allies cast your spirit's spells, they gain other bonuses.
Skewer and anchor incorporeal targets with a force anchor.
Teleport the target a short distance while freeing them from restraints.
Conjure a Huge mastodon made of ice and snow
Target takes -1 penalty to Reflex and Acrobatics, discharge to perform a trip combat maneuver.
Grow a group of poisonous mushrooms.
Connects two planes for travel or summoning.
Channel the power of Mammon into a single coin.
Teleports you and select creatures to predetermined location.
Creates a geyser of boiling water.
Summon a wolf mount made of black smoke which emanates fear.
Create bolts of negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead, possibly blinding the target.
Makes one 5-ft. square or one object sticky.
Use a mass of tentacles to perform dirty tricks.
Create a hail of tiny pieces of rock and dust.
Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.
As grease, but with a greater area and/or targets
Creates trees and a small spring.
Teleport your armor onto an ally in range
Exhale a cone of smoke which disorients those caught inside. It has a side effect of improving the effects of augury when cast within.
Assemble a sturdy raft and oars from driftwood, reeds, and other river debris.
Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.
As heal on horse or other special mount.
Holy flames damage evil creatures and heal good creatures
Imbued holy symbol serves as a conduit for healing magic
Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.
Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.
Deal ongoing damage to evil creatures and apply penalties
You create a dimensional link with a targeted creature, and switch spots with it.
You may target one creature for every four of your caster levels.
As create pit, but dealing 4d6 damage to those in it as it closes.
Force a number of giant spears of ice from the ground.
Masterwork ice dagger deals +1 cold damage.
Summon a bearded devil to preform a Hellknight initiation
Give someone fast healing 1 for a minute, at the cost of a temporary evil alignment.
As infernal healing, except using fast healing 4.
Healing can restore the dead to life and restore your allies vigor
Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.
Create a portrait of a creature on the touched surface
Channel planar energy into a summoned creature to heal it; can be done immediately when the creature drops to 0 or fewer hit points.
Prepared object appears in your hand.
As instant summons, but for multiple objects and creatures.
Summon a melee weapon to wield.
Enhance your spells that bring the dead back to life.
Hurl a spike of cold iron at a foe
Flood an area with dangerous radiation.
As plane shift, but only works on willing creatures and only transports to the Inner Planes
Teleport target within 30 ft. of itself.
Arrow deals damage as your unarmed strike.
Instantly switch places with a single ally.
Imbue someone with a curse that causes them to sink quickly in water and suffer a -10 penalty to Swim checks.
Enclose the target in a thin sheath of lead.
Call for a leshy swarm to aid you.
You are bound even tighter to your eidolon than normal, and may share hit points with it through your life link ability.
You transfer 3d6 hit points to your eidolon as a swift action.
Transfers 2d6 hit points to your eidolon as a swift action.
Infuse a current with positive energy, healing all living creatures within
Ward yourself with positive energy so any attacking undead take damage.
Illuminate all undead creatures in the area and make them more vulnerable to positive energy.
As sepia snake sigil, except using the Thassilonian schools of magic.
Teleports a friend out of a grapple.
Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.
Transport the target to a dank prison in a horrific demiplane.
Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.
As minor creation, plus stone and metal.
Burst with healing energy when you are dying or killed.
Create a link between you and a summoned creature, allowing you to switch places.
Create a destructive and chaotic rip in reality.
Send a target into a dangerous extradimensional maze.
Fling a fist-sized rock at your opponent, this rock can channel your ki.
Creates one cloth or wood object.
Store a replica of yourself in the Akashic Record, end the spell when injured to be healed 1d8+1/level
As minor reversion, but one creature per level
As mount, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Create a small minion out of mud.
Throw a ball of mud to blind your enemy.
Conjure a supernaturally vicious and clever crow to watch over you.
Amplify music of the spheres to grant fast healing, resistance, and saving throw bonuses to all creatures in the area.
Poisonous stinger deals 1d2 damage and sickens target.
Creature leaves a trail of stinking cloud squares.
Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.
As neutralize poison, but with an automatic success on all caster level checks to neutralize poisons.
Open a path to the Dead Roads, speeding your travel on the Material Plane or the Boneyard
Create an expanding glow that heals allies within it of 1 hp of damage.
Create an expanding glow that heals allies within it of 5 hp of damage.
Creates an explosion of conjured metal pellets.
Mask your features with shadowy illumination.
Fey forces target enemies with random combat maneuvers
Conjures a quasi-real heavy chariot pulled by four horses.
Conjures a phantom to drive vehicles.
As phantom steed, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
Creates an invisible passage through a barrier.
As per dimension door, but with more restrictions and affecting a creature you touch
Temporarily convert a deadly poison into intoxicating alcohol.
As lesser planar ally, but up to 12 HD.
As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.
Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.
As lesser planar binding, but up to 12 HD.
As lesser planar binding, but up to 18 HD.
Traps extraplanar creature of 6 HD or less until it performs a task.
Call an outsider to answer questions
Enforce the rules of the Material Plane on another plane.
As many as 8 subjects travel to another plane.
Ward a container with summoned vipers.
As cure serious wounds, but leave behind a latent venom.
As per fog cloud, but lethally poisonous
Heal a creature and remove its physical impairments
Conjure a cloud of magical arrows.
Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.
As raise dead, but on an animal.
Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.
Target's attacks count as being of your alignment, can banish creature's critically hit to an Outer Plane matching your alignment
Alters item to transport its possessor to you.
Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).
As reincarnate, but creating a body similar to that of a chosen creature, and you secretly keep part of the body.
As lesser rejuvenate eidolon, but cures 3d10 damage +1/level (max +10).
As lesser rejuvenate eidolon, but cures 5d10 damage +1/level (max +20).
Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.
Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.
Frees creatures from paralysis or slow effect.
Remove radiation effects from a target.
Remove all ongoing radiation effects along with restoring ability damage and drain taken as a result.
Suppress disease, nausea, and the sickened condition.
Attune the target's energy to replenish their ki pool.
Conjure an opulent mansion several stories tall.
Enchanted cloak functions as a tent
Restores level and ability score drains.
As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.
Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.
Gain second wind when close to death.
Call a small item into your hand from anywhere.
Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.
As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.
Create a rift filled with demons that extends into the Abyss.
Create a whip of water that you wield as a weapon.
Create a whip that passes through unworked stone
Cast touch healing spells from a distance.
Create a whirling cloud of sand around someone, making it harder for them to speak.
Create a large whirlwind of sand, blinding and hampering the ability to speak of those within.
Send a message scroll to any location you have previously been
Safeguard your spellbook on the Ethereal Plane
Heal a small amount of hit points, only usable at less than 1/4 hp
Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.
As secret chest, except the coffer is smaller and can only remain on the Ethereal Plane for a short time.
As secret chest, except it affects a small structure, vault, or oversized chest.
Creates a snake-shaped text symbol that immobilizes reader.
Summon manacles onto a target creature
Empowers bombs you throw to cover the target with a shadowy substance that grants it concealment and limits its vision.
Create an area of darkness that strengthens shadow spells and attracts kytons
Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.
Cone of silver darts deals 1d6 piercing damage/level, less against armored targets.
Increase the DC of Climb checks in the area
Targets are covered in mud that blinds them and acts like slow.
Enhance your bardic performance to grant fast healing to three creatures.
Conjure music from a good-aligned plane
